usermanager module¶

Module managing application users.

class usermanager.UserManager(cursor, conn)[source]¶

Bases: object

Class managing application users.

Parameters:

  • cursor (sqlite3.Cursor) – SQLite database cursor.

  • conn (sqlite3.Connection) – SQLite database connection.

login_user(username, password)[source]¶

Verifies user login credentials.

Parameters:

  • username (str) – Username.

  • password (str) – User’s password.

Returns:

Tuple (bool, int) - (login success, user_id).

Return type:

tuple

register_user(username, password)[source]¶

Registers a new user in the system.

Parameters:

  • username (str) – Username.

  • password (str) – User’s password.

Raises:

sqlite3.IntegrityError – If user with given username already exists.
